project.description:
This job submits packages from the "staging" subproject of an [IO]BS project to the main project. Only packages that built successfully are submitted.

THIS is for Cloud 2.0 and up
use openstack-submit-DCS for 1.0

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: project
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the main project that should be updated with packages from its staging project.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: subproject
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the subproject that acts as staging project.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: packagefilter
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: space separated strings to filter the packages by their names (from the beginning)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# DEBUG MODE with E=echo # NORMAL MODE with E= E= #==========================
case $subproject in None) echo "No valid 'subproject' provided - defaults for safety reasons to 'None'" exit 1 ;; "-") echo "Subproject set to '-': skip job, do not fail (eg. for Master project)" exit 0 ;; esac
export BS=IBS case $BS in OBS) OSC="osc -A https://api.opensuse.org" ;; IBS) OSC="osc -A https://api.suse.de" ;; esac
COS=$project COSS=$COS:$subproject export BS_CHECKOUT=/home/jenkins/${BS}_CHECKOUT/$COSS submitcmd="echo no submit for project=$project" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP2
case $project in ### backward compatibility for Cloud 1.0 #Devel:Cloud:1.0) # submitcmd="$OSC submitreq -m 'jenkins-submit-project'" # OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP2 #;; ### Cloud:OpenStack:[EF]*) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP2 ;; Cloud:OpenStack:[GH]*) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP3 ;; Devel:Cloud:2.0) submitcmd="$OSC submitreq -m 'jenkins-submit-project'" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP3 ;; Devel:Cloud:3) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP3 ;; isv:SUSE:Cloud:2.[05]|isv:SUSE:Cloud:3.0) submitcmd="$OSC copypac -K -e" OSCBUILDDIST=SLE_11_SP3 ;; *) echo "Please add support for the project: $project" exit 1 esac
for COMPONENT in `$OSC ls $COSS 2>/dev/null | grep -E "^(${packagefilter// /|})" | grep -v "^_product."` ; do cd $BS_CHECKOUT || exit 1 cd $COMPONENT || exit 1
grep -q "<linkinfo" .osc/_files || exit 2
if $OSC rdiff $COS $COMPONENT $COSS | grep . && $OSC api /build/$COSS/$OSCBUILDDIST/x86_64/$COMPONENT/_status | grep -E 'code="succeeded"|package="_product"' then $E $submitcmd $COSS $COMPONENT $COS fi done
